Name: Metropolis
About the game: Metropolis - The Ultimate City Simulator Metropolis is a city simulator like no other. In your role as Mayor you need to rebuild and regenerate your city to become one of the best in the world. Financial mismanagement has brought the city to it's knees and the previous administration are facing many accusations of corruption and embezzlement. As the newly elected Mayor your challenge is to rebuild the city to become the top 'most liveable city' in the world. Your task won't be easy, all essential services have been run down and the major buildings of the city have fallen into disrepair. While breathing life back into the city you'll have to watch your back, political opponents are ready to strike at every opportunity and your fate will be decided by the voters at the next election. Key Features... â€‹Over 60 building types Day and night cycles Opposition parties and elections Press conferences Comprehensive policy options 4 types of public transport Fully functioning stock exchange Detailed financial information 5 types of tax income Fully functional global economy Intelligent news channel Changing land and property values Build, invest and sell property Detailed crime statistics CCTV and Police Helicopter Distinct and unique city suburbs
